examples: And compulsions can range from excessive cleaning or double checking, to the fastidious arrangement of objects, or walking in predetermined patterns.
Being neat, and orderly, and fastidious does not make you OCD.
What makes dermestids ideal for this job is that they're fast and fastidious eaters.
Most famously, if Alexander Fleming had been a little more fastidious about keeping his lab clean, we might not have penicillin.
words.defineEn: describing someone who is very particular or demanding about their appearance, grooming, or clothing
words.defineVi: mô tả ai đó rất đặc biệt hoặc đòi hỏi về ngoại hình, chải chuốt hoặc quần áo của họ

examples: Two could play at that game, smart guy.
After all, an electrical brain is smarter than the sum of its parts.
Buying a house in this neighborhood is a smart move.
He gained a reputation as a smart number-cruncher who could turn data into policy.
She's not too smart, but at least her heart is in the right place.
words.defineEn: (of people or clothes) looking neat, tidy, and elegantly fashionable
words.defineVi: (về người hoặc quần áo) trông gọn gàng, ngăn nắp và hợp thời trang

examples: You know, spruce up the joint.
So, this must be a spruce!
Trees of all different species, like Sitka spruce and Douglas fir, grew off of the redwoods’ branches.
The wood only comes from spruce trees that grow at just the right altitude to produce a rich tone.
This Swedish spruce survived as a low shrub for 9,500 years, but as this mountaintop climate has become warmer, a single trunk has risen above the rest.
words.defineEn: smart, stylish, and well-groomed in appearance
words.defineVi: thông minh, phong cách và ngoại hình được chăm sóc chu đáo

examples: And I don't expect it to make a clean-cut.
She's way too clean-cut for that kind of guy.
Pizza here is so clean-cut that it's like, almost, it's like too-- - It's like boring.
words.defineEn: neat and conventional appearance, hairstyle, or behavior
words.defineVi: ngoại hình, kiểu tóc hoặc hành vi gọn gàng và thông thường

examples: He looks a million bucks with his dapper suit and polished shoes.
The Carboniferous was given its name in 1822 by two dapper English geologists.
And finally, another of these Late Eocene giant penguins wasn’t the dapper bird we picture today when we think of penguins.
A lot of you were curious to know who the dapper gentleman in the photo above the sink in the wolf CSI video was.
A reviewer at car blog Jalopnik said the CLA is an economy car dressed in a fancy suit, but underneath the dapper garb lies a compromised Benz.
words.defineVi: gọn gàng, phong cách và ăn mặc đẹp

examples: So my best guess is she either felt unclean and over groomed herself, or she was being picked on by her mate or her babies.
words.defineEn: well-cared for, tidy, and well-maintained in appearance or behavior
words.defineVi: được chăm sóc tốt, gọn gàng và duy trì tốt về ngoại hình hoặc hành vi

examples: He keeps in good trim by going to the gym three times a week.
To reduce the risk of heart disease, trim the excess fat from meat before cooking.
As she prepared the celery for a salad, she trimmed the leafy stalks and discarded the tougher parts.
Samantha has been keeping in trim by practicing yoga and meditation.
Even our first tools were trimmed to a symmetrical shape.
words.defineVi: gọn gàng và được chăm sóc tốt

words.defineEn: disheveled, unkempt, or provocative appearance that is perceived as distasteful or inappropriate
words.defineVi: vẻ ngoài bù xù, nhếch nhác hoặc khiêu khích được coi là khó chịu hoặc không phù hợp

examples: The stray dog had a scruffy and unkempt appearance, with a face only a mother could love, but that didn't stop him from finding a loving home with a compassionate family.
He looks like a scruffy Ashton Kutcher.
Now I know he looks a bit scruffy, and that’s because he doesn’t have any feathers on his chest or sleek covert feathers on his shoulders.
words.defineEn: having an appearance that is untidy, dirty, or worn out
words.defineVi: có vẻ ngoài không gọn gàng, bẩn hoặc cũ

examples: He worked as a waiter in a rather shabby restaurant.
The town today is a shabby, down-at-heel place.
That is not too shabby.
Which is, still, not too shabby!
Which is not too shabby for 34-year-old Voyager probe data.
words.defineEn: (of a person) dressed in worn and old clothes
words.defineVi: (của một người) mặc quần áo sờn và cũ

examples: He worked in a down-at-heel café.
She had a decidedly down-at-heel appearance.
The town today is a shabby, down-at-heel place.
You have come all this way with that down-at-heel shoe?
words.defineEn: having a shabby or unkempt appearance
words.defineVi: có vẻ ngoài tồi tàn hoặc nhếch nhác

examples: When he finally emerged, his disheveled appearance made him look a sight to behold.
He looks like something the cat brought in with his disheveled hair and dirty clothes.
We began to see vacillating practices by the staff and Mama began to look disheveled.
words.defineEn: a person's untidy or messy appearance, typically their hair or clothing, as if it has not been properly groomed or cared for
words.defineVi: vẻ bề ngoài không gọn gàng hoặc lộn xộn của một người, điển hình là tóc hoặc quần áo của họ, như thể nó không được chải chuốt hoặc chăm sóc đúng cách

examples: My ragged friend explained that a hungry wolf is fixed to no place, apologizing for not staying in touch but saying he drifted wherever he could find work or means of shelter.
Although the new employee lacked experience, the hiring manager believed that a ragged colt may make a good horse and decided to give them a chance.
Hanuman arrives in Lanka only to discover a grief stricken woman in ragged clothes sitting beneath a tree in the Ashoka garden It's Sita.
words.defineEn: (of clothes) shabby, old and in poor condition
words.defineVi: (quần áo) tồi tàn, cũ kỹ, tồi tàn

examples: Christine: That he dresses slovenly when he goes out with me, I don't like that.
words.defineEn: lacking of cleanliness and neatness, often implying a disregard for personal hygiene or grooming
words.defineVi: thiếu sạch sẽ và gọn gàng, thường ám chỉ việc coi thường vệ sinh cá nhân hoặc chải chuốt

examples: The name means 'a windswept house on a hill', and it is a very good description.
words.defineEn: describing an appearance that has been affected by the wind, often implying a slightly disheveled yet attractive look
words.defineVi: miêu tả vẻ ngoài bị ảnh hưởng bởi gió, thường ám chỉ một vẻ ngoài hơi rối bù nhưng hấp dẫn

examples: Don't worry mum, we made it snappy!
Fetch me a bandage and make it snappy!
I wish I could make it big in my career and keep on moving quickly, you know, keep on making it snappy.
This is a lot more snappy.
Storage should be extremely snappy on this machine.

words.defineEn: having a neat and tidy appearance, with clean and styled hair, well-manicured nails, and clothing that is clean, ironed, and fits well
words.defineVi: có vẻ ngoài gọn gàng và ngăn nắp, với mái tóc sạch sẽ và được tạo kiểu, móng tay được cắt tỉa cẩn thận và quần áo sạch sẽ, là ủi và vừa vặn
